questionText: What is the value of philosophy?

answerOptions.answerText: A. It provides definitive answers to all questions
B. It removes dogmatism and expands knowledge
C. It limits human inquiry and knowledge
D. It keeps us narrow-minded and conventional

questionText: Can unanswerable philosophical questions still contribute to understanding?

answerOptions.answerText: A. No, unanswerable questions have no value
B. Yes, understanding can still be advanced
C. Unanswerable questions have no right answer
D. Unanswerable questions are a waste of time
